kamkaruwange dinaya wiya yuthu mayi dinaya ada samaranne deshapalakayinge dinayak washayeni.deshapalana paksha thaman samaga janathawa sitina bawata pradarshanaya kirimata kolambaata senaga genwa janatha pelapali nirmanaya kara, ee senaga pittaniyakata gal kara atti halena deshana pawathwa rata hath bhagayen genwa gath senaga raswim bhumiye atharamankara sukhopabhogi ratha walata wada pala yanneya.
lanu tikayi, polu tikayi, kulikarayoyi ekama nam masseda e්kama wanneya.
